level.heading: Mayor authorized to issue research grants.
level.text: The Mayor may issue grants for research concerning the quality of the District waters to universities and institutions.

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 5-188
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 5-188, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 8-101.04.

level.heading: Delegation of Authority
level.text: Delegation of authority pursuant to Law 5-188, see Mayor's Order 87-278, December 11, 1987.
Delegation of authority pursuant to D.C. Law 5-188, the "Water Pollution Control Act of 1984", see Mayor's Order 98-50, April 15, 1998 (45 DCR 2696).

level.heading: Editor’s Notes
level.text: Extension of authority: The authority of the Mayor to issue grants under this section was extended to both the Department of Regulatory Affairs and the Department of Public Works by Reorganization Plan No. 2 of 1987, effective July 3, 1987.
